main event: An Air Force report details an unidentified metallic object observed traveling at approximately 120 mph over a golf course in Japan.
interesting points: The object was described as shapeless and highly polished silver,It was estimated to be about 2.5 feet in diameter and 5 feet high,The object rose vertically to 1,000 feet and changed direction,No smoke or exhaust was detected,The observer noted a complete lack of sound from the object.
witness description: S/Sgt B68 ICH WIND, observed the object while on a golf course
